item.title: Gitlab-CI Introduction
item.description: Gitlab CI Concept Gitlab DevOps GitOps Workflow code push -> pipeline -> stage -> job Design plan -> code -> build -> test -> release -> deploy -> operate -> monitor -> plan Runner Executors Shell VirtualBox Docker Docker Machine Kubernetes Else… References Gitlab CI/CD Gitlab Runner .gitlab-ci.yaml Runner Register gitlab-runner register After register concurrent = 1 check_interval = 0 [session_server] session_timeout = 1800 [[runners]] name = "public-shell" url = "https://gitlab.
